EmailTemplate.name: Grad Reminder W London 12.30pm
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Graduation on 22 October
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REMINDER OF INVITATION TO YOUR GRADUATION
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on your commitment and contribution to The Challenge this summer. It would be great to see you at the graduation.
If you have not yet let us know if you are coming, please RSVP by clicking on the following link:
http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3a132cae1853d4e&q1={!Contact.Id}&q2=1
Where: Twickenham Stadium 200 Whitton Road Twickenham TW2 7RE
When: 22/10/2011
12:30 - 15:00
www.the-challenge.org
facebook.com/thechallengenetwork
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
